natlang.rdg.microplanner
Class MicroPlanner

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.microplanner.MicroPlanner
public class MicroPlanner
extends java.lang.Object

The MicroPlanner is responsible for converting the document plan into a rhetorical dependency graph, while generating sentence plans and performing the first part of the lexicalization

          Constructor - Initializes necessary variables

public RSGraph transform()

transformDepthFirst

public void transformDepthFirst(RSVertex v)
Transforms the document plan depth first and converts the leaf nodes into dependency trees

createTree

public RSDepTreeModel createTree()
Creates a dependency tree for the current plot element. Doing this it first chooses the correct template and calls the associated function.

transformGoal

public void transformGoal()
Decides how the goal should be lexicalized which depends on the type of goal (attain, sustain, avoid, leave), the type of subplotelement (action, state, object) and whether the agens of the goal is the same as the agens of the subplotelement
